# Tabelas de Contingência códigos
`# Carregamento `
```{r setup,,message=F}
library('titanic')
library('tidyverse')
library('janitor')
usethis::use_git()
usethis::use_github()


```
#### Tabela 2x2


```{r,message=F}
df=titanic_train
# Usando o pacote janitor
df %>%
    group_by(Sex,Survived) %>% 
    summarise(n=n())   %>% 
    spread(Survived, n) %>% 
    rename(Surv_N=`0`,Surv_Y=`1`) %>% 
    adorn_totals("row") %>% 
    adorn_totals("col") %>%
    ungroup() 

# Sem usar o janitor

t=df %>%
    group_by(Sex,Survived) %>% 
    summarise(n=n())   %>% 
    spread(Survived, n) %>% 
    rename(Surv_N=`0`,Surv_Y=`1`) %>% 
    ungroup() 
t %>% 
  select(-Sex) %>% 

  mutate(rowsum = rowSums(.),colsum=colSums(.)) 

  mutate(rowsum = rowSums(.),colsum=colSums(.)) # quase finalizad 

  

   
```
